name: Almost Impossible: Level 1
description:
Is this game challenging, No it is almost impossible. Keep in mind this game is still beatable. 

The squares are invading, It is up to you to shoot them off.  There are different types of enemies and bullets. The enemies are Regular, swarmers, the boss, and the final boss. You have three types of bullets. Regular, Powerbullet, and Super Bullet.

If you beat the game, comment down below, enjoy!
